column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I LOVE this place!! I got the berry pancakes
column2: buttermilk pancakes with berries and powdered sugar. Simple
column3: but amazing!! My friends got the berry bliss pancakes
column4: the same thing as I got but with sweet fruity sauces drizzled over them!! They couldn't stop saying how good they were. Our waiter was so kind and fun
column5: he made the experience even better!! There were a LOT of people there
column6: but the staff was great and we were seated and with our food in an impressive amount of time. If you're I'm Chicago
